content: *pattern is only available from web archive org* this pattern page is a part of the crochet for every room collection this one is in the teen room section color-me-crazy crochet materials bernat satin 100 g/3 5 oz main color mc 04605 sunset 9 balls contrast a 04732 maitai 7 balls contrast b 04013 mocha 4 balls *3 colors 20 balls total* size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook archived information 1 1 http //web archive org/web/20090603012036/http //www bernat com/home/teenroom html
